attributes.action: ensure that terrestrial tv channels offer genuine alternative programming during peak viewing periods.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To require TV channels to cooperate over their output so that the current sitation of wall-to-wall soaps comes to an end, providing alternatives between 7.00 and 9.00 pm, or limiting the number of episodes to a more reasonable weekly level - twice a week as opposed to every night,

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
